April Bey bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri nke oge a na Los Angeles nke a maara nke ọma màkà ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya nke na-emepụta nkọwa banyere okwu ụmụ nwanyị ojii nke oge a. Ọrụ collage nke Bey na-ejikọta ọtụtụ ihe dịka caulking, resin, osisi na akwa. N'ilekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị ojii, Bey na-ejide agụụ na ike, ike na agụụ mmekọahụ n'ọrụ ya, nke na-enyocha ntachi obi nke ụmụ nwanyị na ihu abụọ nke atụmanya ọha na eze ébé ụmụ nwanyị na-echegbu onwe ha. Bey na-eji foto foto nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na ọdịbendị nke ógè a dịka Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, Solange, Issa Rae, na Michaela Coel na ederede nke na-ekwu maka akụkọ ndị ụmụ nwanyị ojii nọ ugbu a na-emepụta banyéré njirimara ha. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Band of Vices Gallery, Coagula Curatorial, Liquid Courage Gallery na Barnsdall Art Park's Municipal Art Gallery.
Bey tolitere n'àgwàetiti New Providence, Bahamas

O nwetara nzèrè BFA na eserese na 2009 na Mahadum Ball State, na MFA na eserise na 2014 na Mahaduma California State, Northridge. Ọ bụ prọfesọ na ngalaba nke Studio Arts na Glendale Community College. Ọ bụ Gavlak Gallery na-anọchite anya Bey ugbu a.
Ihe ngosi ngosi nka nkè mbụ nkè April Bey nke akpọrọ, Atlantica, The Gilda Region meghere na Mée 26, 2021, na Los Angeles na California African American Museum
Ọ bụ ntinye immersive nke na-atụle Afrofuturism, queerness, feminism, na omenala ịntanetị na Black America.
